00019 #ifndef SYSTEMINFO_H

00022 // C-header files do not include compat.h
00023 // Instead, they should include auto_link.hpp, which sets up automatic
00024 // library selection on MSVC

00030 #define SMBIOSPARSEEXCEPTION        0x02
